rules_text: Eureka! [i](At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.)[/i]
special_text:
Eureka! [i](At the beginning of each end step, you get a research counter if you cast a spell this turn. Then if you have eight or more research counters, remove them and create a Masterpiece token of your choice.)[/i]
[+1]: Untap up to one target artifact you control.
[-2]: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an artifact card.
notes: !script "<s><l>Invent Cultivating Spheres</l><f>/spawn Cultivating Spheres DOA</f></s><s><l>Invent Mirror of Possibilities</l><f>/spawn Mirror of Possibilities DOA</f></s><s><l>Invent Thrice-Folded Lotus</l><f>/spawn Thrice-Folded Lotus DOA</f></s>","t"
